Articles.Content:
hey !

My name is Mr.redcosmos but call me Red.

Here is my presentation :

Speudo : Mr.redcosmos or Red

Age : 17 years old

Nationnality : French

Sexe : men

My favorite game: KSP and Minecraft ( I play also to other games Steam )

Discription:

I am a student in the professional.

I registered on this forum to improve my English.

My objectif : I want to integrate more easily the world of English.

PS: My english is no perfect but i have improve.

Welcome!

You will have A Good time here!

Bienvenue Redcosmos!

J'ai ne pas parles francais bon, mais je suis apprentissage

Edited November 12, 2014 by ZodiaK

I also prefer to be called Red.

Welcome aboard! Your English is already fairly good, I'm sure it will improve during your stay here. Be sure to check out the French forum in the International area if you get stuck.
